DOC.detailed_description: Women PCOS ( Rotterdam definition ) anovulation resistant clomiphene citrate receive recombinant FSH use low-dose step-up protocol one cycle . Serum level estradiol , AMH , LH , FSH , inhibin B ultrasound ( U/S ) parameter assess twice week 3 day appearance > 1 dominant follicle ( ) .The start dose recFSH 50 IU/day . In absence criterion dominance ( see ) 14 day 50 IU/day , recFSH dose increase 25 IU/day every 7 day dominance achieve . Dominance define appearance least one follicle > 10 mm grow least 2 mm/day serum E2 > 100 pg/L . Ultrsound examination perform 7-MHz transvaginal transducer ( Sonoline Elegra , Siemens ) , real time , accord standardize protocol.Serum AMH level assess use second-generation enzyme immunoassay AMH-EIA .
